text_commands.name: send
text_commands.description: Make the bot send a message

text_commands.name: broadcast
text_commands.description: Get the bot to play some music

text_commands.name: moveto
text_commands.description: Add the bot to a voice channel

text_commands.name: nyv (In music mode only)
text_commands.description: Play the following music from the search

text_commands.name: pyv (In music mode only)
text_commands.description: Play the previous music from the search

text_commands.name: rsslist
text_commands.description: Affiche la liste des liens rss pour un channel

text_commands.name: rssadd
text_commands.description: Add an rss link to the list of a channel

text_commands.name: rssremove
text_commands.description: Remove an SSR link to the list of a channel

text_commands.name: rfo
text_commands.description: Retrieves once the rss link data from the list of the specified channel

text_commands.name: rfa
text_commands.description: Automatically retrieve rss link data from the specified channel list
